statements: SELECT * FROM space_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount FROM space_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Deposit';
SELECT description, amount FROM space_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM space_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_type, SUM(amount) FROM space_transactions GROUP BY transaction_type;
SELECT * FROM space_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase' AND amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_date, amount FROM space_transactions WHERE amount < 50 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT transaction_type, MAX(amount) AS max_amount FROM space_transactions GROUP BY transaction_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT DISTINCT transaction_type, AVG(amount) AS avg_amount FROM space_transactions GROUP BY transaction_type HAVING AVG(amount) > 75;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, description FROM space_transactions WHERE description LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY transaction_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM projects WHERE launch_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, budget FROM projects ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE expense_amount > 1000;
SELECT project_name, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expenses FROM projects JOIN expenses ON projects.project_id = expenses.project_id GROUP BY project_name;
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE project_id = 'c7d9fa23-48a8-4f1c-81f5-29c9ee5be8fc';
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM projects WHERE launch_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_id, project_name, budget FROM projects ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, launch_date, budget FROM projects WHERE budget >= 5000 AND budget <= 10000;

SELECT p.project_id, p.project_name, e.expense_description, e.expense_amount FROM projects p INNER JOIN expenses e ON p.project_id = e.project_id WHERE e.expense_amount > 1000 ORDER BY e.expense_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM mission;
SELECT mission_name, launch_date FROM mission WHERE destination = 'Mars';
SELECT mission_id, mission_name, launch_date, destination FROM mission WHERE budget > 100000;
SELECT mission_name, destination, budget FROM mission ORDER BY launch_date DESC;
SELECT m.mission_name, a.name, a.nationality FROM mission m INNER JOIN astronaut a ON m.mission_id = a.mission_id;
SELECT * FROM mission WHERE launch_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT mission_name, budget FROM mission WHERE budget > 100000 ORDER BY mission_name ASC;
SELECT a.name, a.nationality, m.mission_name FROM astronaut a INNER JOIN mission m ON a.mission_id = m.mission_id;
SELECT m.mission_name, e.amount FROM mission m LEFT JOIN expense e ON m.mission_id = e.mission_id WHERE e.amount > 5000;
SELECT DISTINCT destination FROM mission WHERE budget < 50000 ORDER BY destination ASC;
SELECT * FROM SpaceProjects;
SELECT project_name, project_budget FROM SpaceProjects ORDER BY project_budget DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM SpaceProjects WHERE project_budget > 100000;
SELECT * FROM Expenses WHERE expense_amount < 5000 ORDER BY expense_date ASC;
SELECT astronaut_name, astronaut_age, astronaut_specialty FROM Astronauts WHERE astronaut_specialty = 'Engineering';
SELECT * FROM SpaceProjects WHERE project_budget > 100000
SELECT project_name, project_budget FROM SpaceProjects ORDER BY project_budget DESC
SELECT * FROM Expenses WHERE expense_amount < 500
SELECT astronaut_name, astronaut_specialty FROM Astronauts WHERE astronaut_age > 30
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM SpaceProjects JOIN MissionLogs ON SpaceProjects.project_id = MissionLogs.project_id
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM projects ORDER BY project_name DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, end_date FROM projects WHERE start_date >= '2021-01-01' AND end_date <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT project_id, project_name, MAX(end_date) AS latest_end_date FROM projects;
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE project_name LIKE '%research%';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT description, amount FROM expenses WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT staff_name, position FROM staff WHERE project_id = 3 AND position='Manager';
SELECT resource_name, cost FROM resources WHERE project_id = 1 AND cost < 500 ORDER BY resource_name;
